resources.string: Indicates a blossoming partnership, usually romantic, but also warm friendships, beneficial business partners, and fruitful creative unions. A strong mutual attraction as well as respect and harmony.

Signifies an imbalance or disharmony in life or a partnership. A romantic relationship may be heading toward dissolution or is one-sided and requires work to be balanced. May also indicate self-love and focusing inward instead of on others. A need for self-acceptance and self-respect.
